entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Tensor Dimensions Refining #113863
  • State of WASM/WASI support in Net 9 #113858
  • Stack overflow in FileSystemWatcher when running as systemd service #113855
  • Invoking an unmanaged fastcall function pointer under x86 Windows fails at runtime #113851
    Future
  • [cDAC] Improve logging #113844
    10.0.0
  • Deserialization crashes when having required init property in nested class and using source generation mode #113841
  • AltJit hits "Assert failure: reserveUnwindInfo() can only be called before allocMem(), but allocMem() has already been called" #113840
    10.0.0
  • Mono inconsistency in error case when using ExplicitThis when defining constructor #113839
  • JsonObjectCreationHandling.Populate not working with required and init with source generation #113838
  • [browser] NoFingerprint, LazyLoadingTests.LoadLazyAssemblyBeforeItIsNeeded, timeout #113836
    10.0.0
  • [Test Failure] SslStreamDisposeTest.Dispose_ParallelWithHandshake_ThrowsODE on Unix #113833
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `(consume == 0) || (ComputeAvailableSrcCount(tree) == consume)` during 'Linear scan register alloc' #113832
    10.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.CancelSendPingAsync on OSX #113831
  • JIT: Assertion failed `genTypeSize(op1) == genTypeSize(simdBaseType)` during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #113829
    10.0.0
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] Invalid SocketOption in `MulticastInterface` on new macOS versions (14.7, 15.2) #113827
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tls/TestTLSWithLoadedDlls/TestTLSWithLoadedDlls.cmd #113816
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/throwbox/filter/filter.dll #113815
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: profiler/elt/slowpatheltenter/slowpatheltenter.cmd #113814
    10.0.0

Closed

  • CORJIT_FLAG_READYTORUN and CORJIT_FLAG_PREJIT #113823
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Expand GT_RETURN condition to GT_JTRUE #65370
    10.0.0
  • Different codegen for `return cond;` vs `if (cond) return true; return false;` #8363
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Caller information atribute for the caller type or reflection info #113848
  • Reduce iteration over regmaskTP in relevant methods #113670
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder not emitting calling convention for Calli + CallingConventions.HasThis #113626
    10.0.0
  • mTLS handshake not working on Linux from .NET 5.0.15/6.0.x #71825
    Future
  • CreateSubKey(string, RegistryKeyPermissionCheck, RegistrySecurity?) ignores its third argument #113538
    10.0.0
  • PollGC rewrite and TS_CatchAtSafePoint #113807
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_35000/test35000/test35000.cmd #113106
    10.0.0
  • Getting the QCall method pointer from the CLR. #113837
  • HttpWebRequest.AddRange generates incorrect header if called twice #113690
    10.0.0
  • HttpClient does not respect DefaultRequestVersion with version 3 and DefaultVersionPolicy.RequestVersionOrLower #113245
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Standardized PaginatedList class #113795
  • Possible null reference exception in SslStream.Protocol #110804
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Tests.GCTests.ReRegisterForFinalize #113813

PullRequests

Created

  • [Bounds Checks] Make union/intersect operations more precise #113862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP #113861
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Some SVE fixes for code generation #113860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set up CI with Azure Pipelines #113859
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Followon changes from code review comments in the Monitor HMF removal change #113857
    needs-area-label
  • Remove most usages of the macro-based "don't return in this block" hack #113856
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [APX] Make sure KMOV is not encoded in EVEX when JitStressEvexEncoding is set. #113854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Experiment: Use JIT_PInvokeBegin/JIT_PInvokeEnd for establishing P/Invoke frames on 32-bit platforms #113853
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dead code #113852
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use dotnet-install script directly from CDN instead of dot.net #113847
    area-Infrastructure
  • ML-KEM: SubjectPublicKeyInfo #113846
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Fix asserts from #112728 #113845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix resetting for JIT retry #113842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP #113835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SslStreamDisposeTest failures during parallel handshake #113834
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Move assembler code from virtualcallstubcpu.hpp to asmhelpers.asm #113828
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cut off deep recursion over arrays #113825
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove helper method frames from Monitors #113242
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Change CORJIT_FLAG_READYTORUN and CORJIT_FLAG_PREJIT to CORJIT_FLAG_AOT #113850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable SuperPMI replay for APX ISA testing #113843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Detect Zba & Zbb extensions #113676
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Allow using P/Invoke helpers for IL stubs #113824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support HasThis and ExplicitThis calling conventions in AssemblyBuilder and DynamicMethod #113666
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: Overloads #113771
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid rare self-edge in register homing #113796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure RegistryKey.CreateSubKey passes RegistrySecurity #113768
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • [browser] Soft fingerprint for boot config #113762
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [9.0] Update openssl dependency for openSUSE #113548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 9.0.5
  • Remove all explicit GC Poll calls in unmanaged code. #113715
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix x86 exception handling edge case #113760
    arch-x86, os-windows, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [mono] Add a few bridge tests #113703
    area-GC-mono
  • Set Range header correctly in AddRange #113720
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Remove duplicate define in OpenSSL shim #113794
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Remove experimental args from NodeJS WBT runner (part2) #113753
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113699
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix null reference exception in SslStream.Protocol #113606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.165, windows: 134.0.6998.166 #113802
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Passthrough publishing and sourcelink from the outer build #113712
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable inlining in GCTests.ReRegisterForFinalize #113817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement `AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata`. #111642
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Disable FEATURE_STUBPRECODE_DYNAMIC_HELPERS #113811
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add some basic tests for SLH-DSA #113766
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference for tasks #113404
    area-Build-mono
  • Draft : Make operations on fixedRegs less expensive #113713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #112152
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bring up runtime-diagnostics pipeline #113257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Statically link in native dependencies #113627
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    runtime-async
  • Fix assertions related to combining `cmn (extended-register)` (#113337) #113376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tensor<T> select. Iteration along dimensions #113697
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix compare immediate and branch helper for 2^n #113523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: remove single-def restriction from escape analysis type refinement #113808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement the "compact dispatch sections" optimization from CoreCLR's ComWrappers implementation in NativeAOT's implementation #112461
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix break in DirectoryServices SearchResultCollection #113775
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ILLink: Stop giving special treatment to icalls #113704
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] EventPipe - CPU sampling - single thread #113758
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor `CertFreeCRLContext` #112207
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113448
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow using ldsflda on initonly fields outside of cctor #112081
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Reapply "Refactor `external_assembly_probe` to be separate from single-file bundle probing" #113776
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disallow loading non-Explicit types with explicit field offsets #113500
    breaking-change, area-VM-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Remove bounds checks for Log2 function in FormattingHelpers.CountDigits #113790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, reduce-unsafe
  • Delete OSX libmsquic transport nuget package #111557
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Special case List<ClaimsIdentity> in SelectPrimaryIdentity #111799
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security
  • JIT: Optimize bit-wise and operation and compare with same constant value #111933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix foreign exception handling on Windows #113323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Don't pass stack pointer in ECX on x86 funclet ABI #113792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetFrameName #113769
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove redundant nullable annotation #113550
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix Hang on when GetRequestStreamAsync #113409
    area-System.Net
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Enable policheck and tsa #108340
    area-Meta
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate Apple mobile jobs to `osx.15.[amd/arm64].open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Remove extraneous flag check #113784
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
